contract_details.description: Comprehensive security assessment and enhancement implementation to protect swarm infrastructure and data integrity.
contract_details.background: Security vulnerabilities identified in recent audits require immediate attention to maintain swarm operational security.
objectives: Implement secure coding practices across all modules
Establish security monitoring and alerting systems
Create incident response and recovery procedures
Implement data encryption and secure communication protocols
deliverables: Security audit report with identified vulnerabilities
Enhanced authentication system with multi-factor support
Security monitoring dashboard with real-time alerts
Incident response playbook and automated procedures
Encrypted communication channels between swarm agents
technical_requirements: Security scanning and vulnerability assessment tools
Encryption libraries and secure communication protocols
success_criteria: Secure coding practices implemented across 100% of codebase
Authentication system supports advanced security features
Security monitoring provides real-time threat detection
Incident response procedures tested and documented
Secure communication established between all swarm agents

contract_history.details: Contract auto-generated from Security Enhancement & Vulnerability Assessment template
